snippet.title: Moonfrost | Official First Look at our Alpha Build (WIP)
snippet.description:
Join us for a glimpse into Moonfrost’s current development and alpha gameplay! 

Hosted by Jase Probert, our Marketing and Community Lead, along with Arran Topalian (Lead Designer), Indigo Levy (Senior Game Designer), Daniel Ferrer (Senior Game Designer) and Nuno Gonçalves (Associate Lead Engineer) from our game development team! 

In this stream, our dev team will take you through the current alpha build for Moonfrost which covers Farming, NPCs, Quests and Build Mode.

Chapters 
00:00 Introductions
03:47 About Moonfrost
04:57 Farming, Homestead Core Loop &Targeting
16:11 Quests 
18:05 NPCs & Character Chibi Improvement 
20:08 Dialogue 
23:54 Build Mode
25:55 Decoration Mode
29:16 Future Features 
32:19 Questions & Answers
48:05 Closing Remarks - Thanks For Watching!
49:13 Moonfrost Soundtrack Preview

Moonfrost is a modern-day life-sim farming RPG set in a beautiful next gen pixel-art world.

Embark on an epic journey filled with secrets, wonder and charming characters. It’s time to see what we have in store for you!

The footage captured is in early alpha development and is subject to change.

Keep in touch & join our communities!

🌐 Website: https://moonfrost.io/
🎮 Discord: https://discord.com/invite/moonfrost
🐦X: https://twitter.com/MoonfrostGame
📝 Medium: https://medium.com/@moonfrost
📸 Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/moonfrostgame

#Moonfrost #pixelgames #indiegames #farmgame #pixelart #gaming #rpg
